name: SliceTimer
author: Nipype (interface), Oxford Centre for Functional MRI of the Brain (FMRIB) (tool)
description: SliceTimer, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.fsl, interface: SliceTimer).

inputs.name: Custom order
inputs.description: An existing file name. Filename of single-column custom interleave order file (first slice is referred to as 1 not 0).

inputs.name: Custom timings
inputs.description: An existing file name. Slice timings, in fractions of tr, range 0:1 (default is 0.5 = no shift).

inputs.name: Global shift
inputs.description: A float. Shift in fraction of tr, range 0:1 (default is 0.5 = no shift).

inputs.name: In file
inputs.description: An existing file name. Filename of input timeseries.

inputs.name: Index dir
inputs.description: A boolean. Slice indexing from top to bottom.

inputs.name: Out file
inputs.description: A file name. Filename of output timeseries.

inputs.name: Slice direction
inputs.description: 1 or 2 or 3. Direction of slice acquisition (x=1, y=2, z=3) - default is z.

inputs.name: Time repetition
inputs.description: A float. Specify tr of data - default is 3s.

output-files.name: Slice time corrected file
output-files.description: An existing file name. Slice time corrected file.
